reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

 *RDA*/ Velocity *Coil*/ 6 Wrap Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 wrap *W*/ 45 
*Wicking*/ Full Cotton *Ω*/0.26           

**Testing**        

*Steep Time*/2 weeks *% Used*/ 5     
*PG/VG* 50/50 *Nic%*/0    

**Mouth Feel** 

Light on the nose, and thick on the palate. Very dense for fruit flavor I give it 7 out of 10.

**Throat Hit** 2/10          
 
**Flavor Properties** 

A sweet and tart blueberry, emphasis on the sweet, and I don't know how else to describe it but it tastes blue. 

**Relatable Flavors** 

What I would expect blueberry sucker or Jolly Rancher you taste like, also reminds me of blue popsicles.

**Off Flavors** 

Nothing I can really picke out it is overly sweet, but I'm testing it a little high and it does have a lingering aftertaste but it is not unpleasant.

**Position In The Recipe** 

Due to its  thick density, is going to be a great base note. Low percentages can be used to round out other blueberries ,and believe and should take the top note position in a cream recipe.

**Pairings** 

Other berries, bakeries, citrus and other fruits, tobacco's, creams, and cereals.

**Notes** 



https://www.google.com/search?q=blueberry+candy&client=ms-android-att-us&biw=360&bih=511&tbm=isch&prmd=sivn&source=lnms&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiQ2I2xs7_NAhWG3SYKHXXlBQEQ_AUIBigC#imgrc=sUe02Cr1yI7m5M%3A

A very good blueberry

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blueberry

http://cdn2.bigcommerce.com/n-arxsrf/q51ae6vv/products/1318/images/4237/HS_Blueberry__88316.1427910584.1280.1280.jpg?c=2


**Rating** 75/100      

*Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.*
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Blueberry
